metadata.title: Hnadcrafted Moonstone Mala: 108 +1 Beads on Knotted String
features: Moonstone is Associated with the moon, this stone embodies a lunar energy and possesses a connection to female qualities
This stone is known for its ability to soothe and balance the emotions and for healing female problems.
This Mala beads are knotted and is ready to wear or for Jaap.
The Mala is Spiritually activated & infused with vedic mantra
description: Moonstone is a stone of protection, especially during childbirth, pregnancy, and travel. It fosters healthy relationships, attracts good fortune, prosperity, happiness, releases shame and guilt. This Moon Stone Mala is Handmade & will come with a Handmade Drawstring Bag .The Mala is Spiritually activated & purified. This mala carries many of the same benefits that pearls have to offer. Moonstone is Associated with the moon, this stone embodies a lunar energy and possesses a connection to female qualities. This stone is known for its ability to soothe and balance the emotions and for healing female problems. It is considered sacred, just as the female energy and the moon are sacred. The rainbow moonstone provides balance, introspection, reflection, and new beginnings. Lunar energy used for feeling and understanding, sustaining and maintaining, and intuitive knowledge. It enhances feminine energies, compassion, perception, discernment, creativity, self expression, confidence, composure, safe travel, good fortune, protection, and fulfillment of destiny. This Mala beads are knotted and is ready to wear or for Jaap. This mala can be charged time to time by using a method. After you buy this mala we will inform you a method how to get maximum benefit from this mala.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "3.8 x 2.7 x 0.7 inches; 2.4 Ounces", "Date First Available": "December 22, 2016", "Manufacturer": "Vaibhav Jewels"}
